basic_info.description: I'm Farah Noriffat, a frontend developer who loves turning ideas into seamless, user-friendly web experiences. With nearly seven years of experience, I specialize in crafting responsive, high-performance websites that don't just look good, they work beautifully. Accessibility, modern web standards, and intuitive design are at the heart of what I do, ensuring every project is both technically solid and enjoyable to use. Beyond the code, I thrive on collaboration, problem-solving, and making the web a little better every day. Whether it's optimizing for SEO, enhancing UX, or leading a team toward a shared vision, I bring a mix of creativity, technical expertise, and a bit of strategic thinking to the table. If you're looking for a developer who's passionate about innovation (and maybe a little obsessed with clean code and reusability), let's connect! üöÄ

projects.title: Meller
projects.description: An internal website project for PT. Finnet in the division I interned for. It connects what merchant uses what biller and vise versa.

projects.title: AuthMC
projects.description: The first project as Front end programmer! The project itself is a new way of making a secured authentication called AuthMC. AuthMC uses phone calls and phone numbers validations with reducing cost by 40%, with a more powerful security feature than the two-factor authentication process.

projects.title: Pointsnet
projects.description: The points were redeemed as a cash payment from multiple stores like Starbucks and used in many online shops including Alibaba.

projects.title: TAMAM Market
projects.description: The first project using VueJS for Islam Boarding school markets under one foundation which is Tamam.

projects.title: Infralib SMI
projects.description: Community knowledge sharing through documents, video, images, and articles.

projects.title: Beach Volley
projects.description: First time using Pixi.js! Learning by doing is the most enjoayble experience ever!!

projects.title: Buyble
projects.description: Website that provides services onto the user website like fortune wheel game, survey review through game, and picking deals with crane machine game!

projects.title: AR Coder
projects.description: Using ARJS to change image into marker that when scanned through our website camera displays their 3d model.

projects.title: Esplanade
projects.description: Display house 3d model on marker display and play animations on click!

projects.title: DEVB
projects.description: Halloween-themed party!! The location and marker made the user able to stroll the Virginia Beach along with download stickers or take pictures with filters!

projects.title: Joobloop
projects.description: A B2B website that allow corporates/recruiters to find their employee or the services from Panggilin heroes(users that are verified and skilled).

projects.title: M2U ID
projects.description: M2U ID Web is Maybank's internet banking platform, accessible anytime and anywhere. As a Front-end Developer, I am responsible for implementing user stories and resolving frontend bugs using React.js, Redux, and Redux Thunk. My role involves ensuring seamless functionality, maintaining code efficiency, and optimizing the user interface to enhance the overall banking experience.

projects.title: eBiz Loan SME
projects.description: eBiz Loan is a platform designed for customers and prospective clients to apply for loans, offering two main products: PINTAR and MAXI. As a Front-end Team Leader, I am responsible for defining and overseeing the technical direction of frontend development. My role includes ensuring code quality, optimizing application performance, and maintaining readability and scalability. I actively mentor and guide team members to enhance their technical skills and productivity while collaborating closely with designers, backend engineers, and product stakeholders to create a seamless and intuitive user experience. Through my leadership, I strive to deliver a high-quality platform while fostering a strong and collaborative development team.
